name: Deflector: Specimen One
description:
>Deflector Experiment Log █0█8
>Sample designation: Specimen 1
>Test type: Controlled injection into isolated viral environment via [DATA CORRUPT]
>
>Summary: Specimen evolved based on prior experimentation. Resulting sample exhibits a different behavioral pattern when compared to the original subject (see Experiment Log ██25). New Specimen highly aggressive towards virus. Detecting notable preference towards close quarters engagements. Sample retains ability to Deflect and Evolve. Detecting increase in resilience and agility to compensate for higher risk of engagement. Specimen template logged for further use in [DATA CORRUPT]
Recommend Specimen One designation: Slasher

Deflector is a high-octane roguelite where you can turn the bullet hell tide against your enemies.

In Deflector: Specimen One you play as Slasher. This second generation sample uses a sword to slice at projectiles and enemies alike. In the hostile viral microcosm it relies on superior resilience and agility to survive.

Put Slasher to the test and clear Specimen One to get a unique Slasher skin. Look sharp in both Deflector: Specimen One and the main Deflector game.


When you’re caught between projectiles and a hard place - your only way out is to deflect! Send back everything thrown at you and finally turn the tables on the bullet hell genre!


Combine upgrades to unlock powerful abilities and discover unique combinations in a free-form upgrade system. Create explosive clones, duplicate deflected projectiles, or even rupture the ground itself!
